description: Update DELIVERABLES.md format to include comprehensive summary with workorder metadata, validation scores, granular file tracking (created/edited/added), components added, plan phase breakdown with effort scores, priority checklist table with benefits, and git commit references
goal: Add validation scores, file tracking, and priority checklists to improve deliverables tracking and metrics visibility
requirements: Show plan phases with effort scores and task summaries
Table with task priorities and benefits
Include relevant git commit hashes and summary
Show 'Ready to implement! 🚀' when validation passes
constraints: This becomes the new standard - all existing DELIVERABLES.md files will need to be updated to match this format
Must be generated by generate_deliverables_template tool in coderef-workflow MCP server
Breaking change - replaces current DELIVERABLES.md format completely
